result.title: M-Sec use cases description
result.description: EU leader: TST; JP leader: KEIO The deliverable is going to provide a full analysis of the use cases that will be covered in the M-Sec project. It will describe the different actors/stakeholders involved, the functions and conditions that need to be offered etc. UML diagrams will be provided in order to visualize the use cases.

result.title: Animation pipeline and demo of new runtime rig
result.description: Animation pipeline and demo of new runtime rig (DEM, PU, M6) will be a technical demo showcasing the real time Inverse Kinematics rig generation given an input of animation assets and associated mesh and skeleton. This will result in a virtual character whose animation can be procedurally modified during runtime based on the identification of key end-effectors and how the user wishes to drive them.

result.title: SerIoT multi-layer dataset access through WAPI interfaces
result.description: Technical report describing interoperability & API interfaces for supporting new experiments upon SerIoT architecture. In particular, the initial version of this deliverable is foreseen to be produced in M18 while an updated version will follow in M33.
